scripts.check-formatting: prettier -c './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc  && poetry run isort . --check && poetry run yapf -rd instagram_archiver .stubs test
scripts.fix-pluggy: touch "$(poetry run python -c 'import inspect, os, pluggy; print(os.path.dirname(inspect.getabsfile(pluggy)))')/py.typed"
scripts.format: prettier -w './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc && poetry run isort . && poetry run yapf -ri instagram_archiver .stubs test
scripts.qa: yarn mypy && yarn pylint && yarn check-spelling && yarn check-formatting
